hero.subtitle: We care for your mental health and well-being with qualified professionals available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Melhor Sa√∫de is Mozambique's leading corporate wellness platform, created to transform how companies care for their people. We were born from the need for complete, accessible, and effective solutions that promote stronger, more humane, and productive organizational environments. We combine technology, professional trust, and a people-centered approach to connect companies, employees, and health and wellness specialists. We operate with ethical rigor, valuing confidentiality and professional secrecy in all consultations, and offer humanized, strategic, and digital care that redefines the wellness experience in the corporate environment.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We promote comprehensive employee well-being through secure, personalized digital solutions sustained by the four pillars of health: psychological, legal, financial, and physical. Our goal is to help companies create healthy, positive, and sustainable work environments where everyone can thrive with balance and autonomy.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We want to be the leading national reference in corporate wellness solutions. We work to build a new organizational culture in Mozambique ‚Äî more conscious, humane, and committed to the complete and continuous care of employees in all essential areas of their lives.

values.title: Our Values
values.content: We act with ethics, transparency, and human focus. We value confidentiality, responsible use of technology, and active listening. We believe in the real impact of psychological, legal, financial, and physical care ‚Äî with measurable, accessible solutions centered on each person's needs.

whatIs.question: What is Melhor Sa√∫de?
whatIs.intro: Melhor Sa√∫de is an integrated corporate wellness platform offering specialized support 24 hours a day, 7 days a week across four fundamental pillars:
whatIs.mental: Psychological Wellbeing - Psychologists, psychiatrists, therapists, life coaches, marriage counselors, cognitive-behavioral therapists, occupational therapists, mindfulness specialists, psychoanalysts, and family therapists.
whatIs.physical: Physical Wellbeing - Personal trainers, nutritionists, general practitioners, physiotherapists, nurses, chiropractors, yoga instructors, massage therapists, physical educators, and sports medicine specialists.
whatIs.financial: Financial Assistance - Financial consultants, certified coaches, accountants, investment managers, personal financial planners, credit counselors, personal finance specialists, tax experts, and financial educators.
whatIs.legal: Legal Assistance - Lawyers, paralegals specialized in labor and family law, legal mediators, compliance consultants, public defenders, notaries, civil law specialists, contract consultants, and corporate legal experts.

howToBook.question: How can I book a session with a specialist?
howToBook.answer: After logging in, access your dashboard and click 'Book Session'. Select your desired pillar (Psychological Wellbeing, Physical Wellbeing, Financial Assistance, or Legal Assistance), choose a professional from the specialist directory, and select an available time slot in the calendar. You'll receive immediate confirmation and reminders before your session.

sessionsQuota.question: How does the session quota system work?
sessionsQuota.answer: Your session quota is determined by your subscription plan. Company employees receive sessions allocated by their organization, while individual users have access according to their chosen plan (Monthly, Quarterly, or Annual). You can view your available session balance in your dashboard and use sessions across any of the four pillars.

availability.question: When can I access specialists?
availability.answer: All our specialists are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. You can book sessions at any time that's convenient for you, including weekends and holidays. The platform is always accessible for bookings and self-help resources.

individualPlans.question: What individual plans are available?
individualPlans.intro: We offer three individual plans with full access to all four pillars:
individualPlans.monthly: Monthly Plan - Monthly subscription with automatic renewal and total flexibility
individualPlans.quarterly: Quarterly Plan - 3-month commitment with discount compared to monthly plan
individualPlans.annual: Annual Plan - Best value with greatest annual savings and priority access
individualPlans.access: All plans include unlimited sessions (subject to plan quota), access to self-help resources, validated psychological tests, and support through the help center.

businessPlans.question: How do business plans work?
businessPlans.intro: Business plans are fully customizable according to organization size and needs:
businessPlans.small: Small Teams (up to 50 employees) - Simplified session management and basic usage reports
businessPlans.large: Large Enterprises (50+ employees) - Complete management dashboard, detailed reports, flexible session allocation, and dedicated support
businessPlans.contact: Companies can invite employees, manage session allocation, view aggregated statistics (always respecting individual confidentiality), and customize benefits by department.

selfHelp.question: What self-help resources are available?
selfHelp.answer: The platform offers a complete library accessible 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, including: specialized articles on mental and physical wellbeing, educational videos on financial management, practical guides on legal rights, scientifically validated psychological tests, self-assessment tools, and practical exercises. All content is created and reviewed by certified professionals.

providers.question: How are professionals selected?
providers.answer: All professionals undergo a rigorous credential validation process, including verification of professional certifications, proven experience, and ongoing training. We maintain a diverse team of specialists in each pillar to ensure you find the ideal professional for your needs.

confidentiality.question: How is confidentiality guaranteed?
confidentiality.answer: Confidentiality is absolute. All sessions are private and protected by professional secrecy. Companies only have access to aggregated and anonymous usage data - they never have access to information about individual sessions, consulted professionals, or consultation content. We strictly comply with GDPR and all data protection regulations.

sessionTypes.question: How do sessions work?
sessionTypes.answer: Sessions are conducted via secure video call through the platform, with typical duration of 50 minutes. You can opt for one-time sessions or ongoing support with the same professional. Before your first session, you'll receive guidance on how to prepare and what to expect from the consultation.

cancelReschedule.question: What is the cancellation and rescheduling policy?
cancelReschedule.answer: You can cancel or reschedule sessions directly on the platform. To avoid quota deduction, we recommend cancellation at least 24 hours in advance. Rescheduling can be done at any time, subject to professional availability. In case of emergency or unforeseen circumstances, contact support.

companyManagement.question: How do companies manage employee benefits?
companyManagement.answer: Companies have access to a management dashboard where they can: invite employees through unique codes, allocate session quotas per employee or department, view aggregated usage reports, manage plan renewals, and track wellness impact on the organization (always with anonymous data).

technicalRequirements.question: What technical requirements are needed?
technicalRequirements.answer: You only need a device with internet access (computer, tablet, or smartphone), a working camera and microphone, and an updated browser. The platform is optimized to work on any device and doesn't require additional software installation.

firstSession.question: What to expect from the first session?
firstSession.answer: In the first session, the professional will get to know you, understand your needs and goals, and create a personalized plan. It's okay to be nervous - our specialists are trained to create a welcoming and trusting environment. You can prepare by thinking about topics you'd like to address.

getStarted.question: How do I get started with the platform?
getStarted.answer: Step 1: Register on the platform (using company code or choosing an individual plan). Step 2: Complete your profile with basic information. Step 3: Explore self-help resources or immediately book your first session. Step 4: Select the pillar, choose a specialist, and reserve a time slot. It's simple and quick!
